body:
Peter Apian-Bennewitz wrote:


> *sigh* -.. - rvu, as we know it today, just doesn't ask the server for 
> it. Sorry for not applying bright "*/example, not yet implemented/*" 
> stickers to it in the first place.


(removes foot)  Hey, I *did* say in that same email that I was bowing 
out of the convo, as I already figured I was in over my head...


I guess you could say: */I'm no Radiance expert, but I sometimes play 
one on this list./* (Well, actually, over on radiance-general.)


Thanks for the clarification(s).


-Rob
